Applied Calculus Ch. 2 Sec. 5 Prob. 8
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(ScoreR)
startProblem("AC-2-5-8")
```

Figure 2.56 (in the book) shows part of the graph of cost and revenue for a car manufacturer.  Which is greater, marginal cost or marginal revenue, at 

```{r include=FALSE}
prob1=selectSet(name="2.5.8a", totalPts=1, "cost"=FALSE, "revenue"=TRUE, "neither"=FALSE)
```
* point $q_1$?  `r I(prob1)`
```{r include=FALSE}
prob2=selectSet(name="2.5.8b", totalPts=1, "cost"=FALSE, "revenue"=TRUE, "neither"=FALSE)
```
* point $q_2$? `r I(prob2)`

`r I(endProblem())`
